nodes.bodyText: please add this in tf-deployment.yaml as well, and set the value to 127.0.0.1 to make sure terraform deployment is not affected.

nodes.bodyText: same here, please make sure to add values for all new env variables in tf-deployment.yaml to prevent terraform deployment from breaking.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@ export SECRETS_SYSTEM=${SYSTEM_SECRET}
 
 # Points to database location
 # mysql://user:pw@tcp(host:port)/database?someSetting=value&foo=bar
-export DSN="mysql://${DB_USER}:${DB_PASS}@tcp(localhost:3306)/${DB_NAME}?sql_notes=false&parseTime=true"
+export DSN="mysql://${DB_USER}:${DB_PASS}@tcp(${DB_INSTANCE_URL}:3306)/${DB_NAME}?sql_notes=false&parseTime=true"

@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@ export SECRETS_SYSTEM=${SYSTEM_SECRET}
 
 # Points to database location
 # mysql://user:pw@tcp(host:port)/database?someSetting=value&foo=bar
-export DSN="mysql://${DB_USER}:${DB_PASS}@tcp(localhost:3306)/${DB_NAME}?sql_notes=false&parseTime=true"
+export DSN="mysql://${DB_USER}:${DB_PASS}@tcp(${DB_INSTANCE_URL}:3306)/${DB_NAME}?sql_notes=false&parseTime=true"

nodes.bodyText: I personally prefer to not provide any usable examples in the files to prevent new users from just using these values.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# These environment variables are used in entrypoint.bash to configure your Hydra deployment
+
+# Create a system secret using ‘export SYSTEM_SECRET=$(export LC_CTYPE=C; cat /dev/urandom | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 32 | head -n 1)’. This secret is used to encrypt a fresh database and needs to be set to the same value every time the process (re-)starts. Example value below.
+SYSTEM_SECRET=d9IASarxpnxADhL8WXJPqH27yyDkCmLU

@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# These environment variables are used in entrypoint.bash to configure your Hydra deployment
+
+# Create a system secret using ‘export SYSTEM_SECRET=$(export LC_CTYPE=C; cat /dev/urandom | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 32 | head -n 1)’. This secret is used to encrypt a fresh database and needs to be set to the same value every time the process (re-)starts. Example value below.
+SYSTEM_SECRET=d9IASarxpnxADhL8WXJPqH27yyDkCmLU
